SEARCH
Package HMS.src.appointment

Class SlotManager

java.lang.Object
HMS.src.appointment.SlotManager
public class SlotManager extends Object
Manages time slots for doctors and their appointments. Handles functionalities like initializing slots, setting unavailability, and printing schedules.

      Parameters:

      dateTime - The date and time of the slot to be set as unavailable.
